description.value:
Overcome 2 successes; @Check[type:arcana|dc:34] or @Check[type:thievery|dc:34]

The PCs suppress or disable dangerous traps set to kill would-be thieves and make an explosive ruckus.

Special If a PC fails a check to overcome this scene, they trigger a trap that deals [[/r {16d6}[damage]]]{16d6 damage} to that PC (@Check[type:reflex|dc:36|basic:true]). If the PC critically fails, it deals this damage to all PCs in the scene.
